# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-

[docs]def hello(msg="World"):
    """Prints a friendly message!

    :param msg: message to say
    :type msg: string
    :returns: string
    :raises: something

    .. note::
       Note something

    .. warning::
       Warning!

    >>> hello()
    Hello World!
    >>> hello(msg="there")
    Hello there!
    """
    return "Hello {}!".format(msg)



[docs]def add(a, b):
    """Add two numbers

    Args:
      a (int) - first number

      b (int) - second number

    Returns:
      int

    >>> add(1, 2)
    3
    """
    return a + b
